actions.committee: Committee on International Relations, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on International Relations, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: Providing for corrections in the enrollment of the bill H.R. 4461.

summary.text: Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.R. 4461 (Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies appropriations).

titles.title: Providing for corrections in the enrollment of the bill H.R. 4461.
